=== About the MOTU SRU Team ===

The MOTU Stable Release Updates Team is a team that has been designated the responsibility to review and approve proposed stable release updates to packages in universe. You can read more about stable release updates, including applicable procedures and policies, at the <nowiki>[[StableReleaseUpdates|Stable Release Updates]]</nowiki> page.
